00022 ##This class contains all Methods to convert a original *.vd_ File to its corresponding
00023 ##XML-File.
00024 class FB_XMLConverter:
00025 
00026 
00027     data=""
00028 
00029     read_caption=False
00030     read_record=False
00031     read_table=False
00032     read_value=False
00033     atmp = []
00034     recordname=""
00035     captions = []
00036     val_count=0
00037     __LogObj = None
00038     lineCounter = 0
00039     ByteCount = 0

00041     ## The constructor.
00042     #
00043     # @param self : The object pointer
00044     # @param InFile : Path and Filename of Input-File (*.vd_)
00045     # @param InFile : Path and Filename of Output-File (*.xml)
00046     # @param LogObj : a Object to Logging-Class
00047     def __init__(self,InFile,OutFile,LogObj):
00048         self.vd_datei = InFile
00049         self.xml_datei = OutFile
00050         self.__LogObj = LogObj
00051 
00052     ## Base Method for *.vd_ File to FB-XML-File Conversion
00053     #
00054     #  @param self The object pointer.
00055     def convertToXML(self):
00056 
00057         parse=False
00058         line=""
00059         next=""
00060         OutFileObj = None
00061         InFileObj = None
00062 
00063         try:
00064             if(self.vd_datei != ""):
00065                 OutFileObj = open(self.xml_datei,"w")
00066                 InFileObj = open(self.vd_datei,"r")
00067 
00068                 #LOG File
00069                 self.__LogObj.NewLog(self.vd_datei+" geöffnet",0)
00070                 self.__LogObj.NewLog(self.xml_datei+" geöffnet",0)
00071 
00072                 #write first two lines
00073                 OutFileObj.write("<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"ISO-8859-1\" ?>\n")
00074 
00075                 OutFileObj.write("<eib-products>\n")
00076 
00077                 #read first line and compare of signum
00078                 line = InFileObj.readline()
00079                 line = line.split("\n")
00080 
00081                 if(line[0] != "EX-IM"):
00082                     #LOG File
00083                     self.__LogObj.NewLog("Falsches Format der *vd_ Datei gefunden",1)
00084                     return
00085 
00086 
00087                 line = InFileObj.readline()
00088                 line = line.split("\n")
00089 
00090                 #normal parse-run
00091                 while(True):
00092 
00093 
00094                     next = InFileObj.readline()
00095                     next = next.split("\n")
00096 
00097 
00098                     if(line[0] == "XXX"):
00099                         self.parseLine(line[0],OutFileObj)
00100 
00101                     #cancel first While-Loop , if current line is empty
00102                         break
00103 
00104                     #parse Symbol-Information
00105                     re = compile('^\\\\')
00106                     while(re.match(next[0])):
00107                         #separate "\\"
00108                         line[0] = line[0] + next[0].strip("\\\\")
00109 
00110 
00111                         next = InFileObj.readline()
00112                         next = next.split("\n")
00113 
00114                         if(next[0] == ""):
00115                             if(line[0] != ""):
00116                                 self.parseLine(line[0],OutFileObj)
00117 
00118                     #parse lines after symbolinformation
00119                     self.parseLine(line[0],OutFileObj);
00120                     line=next
00121 
00122 
00123                 OutFileObj.flush()
00124                 OutFileObj.close()
00125                 InFileObj.close()
00126                 #LOG File
00127                 self.__LogObj.NewLog(self.vd_datei+" geschlossen",0)
00128                 self.__LogObj.NewLog(self.xml_datei+" geschlossen",0)
00129 
00130         except IOError:
00131 
00132             #LOG File
00133             self.__LogObj.NewLog("Fehler beim Öffnen der vd_ Datei",2)
00134 
00135             if(OutFileObj != None):
00136                 OutFileObj.close()
00137 
00138             if(InFileObj != None):
00139                 InFileObj.close()
00140 
00141             #LOG File
00142             self.__LogObj.NewLog(self.vd_datei+" geschlossen",0)
00143             self.__LogObj.NewLog(self.xml_datei+" geschlossen",0)
00144 
00145 
00146 
00147         except:
00148 
00149             #LOG File
00150 
00151             self.__LogObj.NewLog("Allgemeiner Fehler beim Parsen der vd_ Datei" \
00152                                  + " in Zeile: " + str(self.lineCounter)  \
00153                                  +" " + line[0],2)
00154 
00155             if(OutFileObj != None):
00156                 OutFileObj.close()
00157                 #LOG File
00158                 self.__LogObj.NewLog(self.xml_datei+" geschlossen",0)
00159 
00160             elif(InFileObj != None):
00161                 InFileObj.close()
00162                 #LOG File
00163                 self.__LogObj.NewLog(self.vd_datei+" geschlossen",0)

00166     def parseLine(self,_line,_OutFileObj):
00167 
00168         tmp=""
00169 
00170         try:
00171             self.lineCounter = self.lineCounter + 1
00172 
00173             #line empty ?
00174             if(len(_line) > 0):
00175                 #erstes Zeichen laden
00176                 start=_line[0:1]
00177 
00178 
00179                 #Start with "T " ? ->
00180                 if(_line[0:2] == "T "):
00181                     start=' '
00182 
00183             else:
00184                 _line=""
00185 
00186             if(_line[0:2] == "N " ):
00187                 #Path of vd_ Datei
00188 
00189                 leer = 0
00190             elif(_line[0:2] == "K " ):
00191                 #Manufacturer tool,Kommentar
00192                 leer = 0
00193             elif(_line[0:2] == "D " ):
00194                 #Date of file
00195                 leer = 0
00196             elif(_line[0:2] == "V " ):
00197                 #Version
00198                 leer = 0
00199             elif(_line[0:2] == "H " ):
00200                 #Typ of Device
00201                 leer = 0
00202             elif(_line[0:1] == "-" ):
00203 
00204                 #Blockende
00205 
00206                 self.read_caption=False    #C-Block
00207                 self.read_record=False     #R-Block
00208                 self.read_table=False      #T-Block
00209                 self.read_value=False      #Values
00210 
00211 
00212             #start with "T " followed by a number -> new table
00213             elif(_line[0:2] == "T " and _line[2:3].isdigit() == True):
00214                 linedata = _line.split()
00215 
00216                 try:
00217 
00218                     #extract Table-Number
00219                     parseInt = int(linedata[1])
00220                     #delete Caption-Array
00221                     del self.captions[0:len(self.captions)]
00222                     #found new Table
00223                     self.read_table=True
00224 
00225 
00226                 except TypeError:
00227                     # not a number
00228                     self.read_value=True
00229                     self.read_record=False
00230 
00231 
00232             #start with "C " followed by a number -> new Caption
00233             elif(_line[0:1] == "C" and _line[1:2].isdigit() == True):
00234                 if(self.read_table == True and self.read_caption == False):
00235                     self.read_caption=True
00236 
00237             #start with "R " followed by a number -> new Record
00238             elif(_line[0:2] == "R " and _line[2:3].isdigit() == True):
00239 
00240                 self.read_value=False
00241                 self.read_caption=False
00242                 self.read_record=True
00243                 self.read_table=False
00244 
00245 
00246                 self.__ValueCount = len(self.captions)
00247                 self.val_count = 0
00248 
00249 
00250             #last entry
00251             elif(_line[0:3] == "XXX"):
00252 
00253                 _OutFileObj.write("\t</"+self.recordname+">")
00254                 _OutFileObj.write("</eib-products>")
00255                 _OutFileObj.flush()
00256 
00257                 return
00258 
00259 
00260             #else: read Values
00261             else:
00262                 self.read_value=True
00263                 self.read_record=False
00264 
00265 
00266             #Do we read a table ?
00267             if(self.read_table == True):
00268                 tunix=0
00269 
00270             #Do we read a Record ?
00271             if(self.read_record == True):
00272 
00273                 self.atmp=_line.split(" ")
00274 
00275                 self.val_count=0
00276 
00277                 if(self.recordname != ""):
00278                     #record end
00279                     _OutFileObj.write("\t</"+self.recordname+">\n")
00280 
00281                 #z.Bsp: R 1 T 3 manufacturer
00282                 self.recordname=self.atmp[4]
00283                 _OutFileObj.write("\t<"+self.recordname+">\n")
00284 
00285 
00286             #Do we read a caption ?
00287             if(self.read_caption == True):
00288                 self.atmp=_line.split(" ")
00289                 #add new caption-element
00290                 self.captions.append(self.atmp[5])
00291 
00292 
00293             #Do we read a Value ?
00294             if(self.read_value == True and self.val_count <= len(self.captions)-1):
00295 
00296 
00297                 if(_line != ""):
00298                     _line = _line.replace("<","&lt;")
00299                     _line = _line.replace(">","&gt;")
00300                     _line = _line.replace("&", "&amp;")
00301                     #write Values to file
00302                     _OutFileObj.write("\t\t<"+self.captions[self.val_count]+">"+_line+"</"+self.captions[self.val_count]+">\n")
00303                     #LOG File
00304                     #self.__LogObj.NewLog("\t\t<"+self.captions[self.val_count]+">"+_line+"</"+self.captions[self.val_count]+">\n",0)
00305 
00306 
00307                 else:
00308                     self.__ValueCount = 0
00309                     self.read_value == False
00310 
00311                 self.val_count = self.val_count + 1
00312 
00313             _line=""
00314 
00315 
00316         except(IOError):
00317             print "Fehler"
